basics.name: Andrew Kurano
basics.label: Artist Programmer
basics.summary: I am a recently graduated computer engineer trying to join the world of Game Design.  Despite having most of my classes deal with low level coding, I prefer higher level coding and integrating it with my love for art.  I would like to take my experience in 3D modeling, Unity Development, and shader coding and learn how to make something beautiful.

work.summary: Combined 3D art and programming knowledge to create VR and AR demos
highlights: Learned how to design programs for Microsoft Hololens
Used Blender to create 3D models for the program
Coordinated with navy sponsors for future project developments

work.summary: Web Developer of NSF grant, for broadening participation of Native Hawaiians in engineering
highlights: Created website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Coordinated with professors and Grant Investigators

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
